citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
9:23am-9:55am on 18-JAN-17.
Honked, knocked, called out loudly. Left message on answering machine at phone number provided on application.
